member.name: T:StreamsDB.Driver.GlobalPosition
member.summary: Represents a position on the global stream.

member.name: F:StreamsDB.Driver.GlobalPosition.Begin
member.summary: Represents the first position of the global stream.

member.name: T:StreamsDB.Driver.IStreamSubscription
member.summary: IStreamSubscription represents a subscription to a stream that can be used to get current and future messages from a stream.

member.name: T:StreamsDB.Driver.ConcurrencyCheck
member.summary:
ConcurrencyCheck specifies the optimistic concurrency check that needs to succeed before a write transaction gets committed. If the check reveals conflicting modifications, the write transaction is aborted.
Use to disable the optimistic concurrency check, or use one of the other static methods of this class to specify a check.

member.name: M:StreamsDB.Driver.ConcurrencyCheck.Skip
member.summary: Skip returns an optimistic concurrency check that will always succeed. In other words, the optimistic concurrency control will be disabled for the write transaction where this check is used.
member.returns: An optimistic concurrency control check that will always succeed.

member.name: M:StreamsDB.Driver.ConcurrencyCheck.ExpectStreamNotExists
member.summary: ExpectStreamNotExists returns an optimistic concurrency check that will only succeed if the stream does not exist.
member.returns: An optimistic concurrency control check that will only succeed if the stream does not exist.

member.name: M:StreamsDB.Driver.ConcurrencyCheck.ExpectStreamVersion(System.Int64)
member.summary: Expect the stream to have the specified version.
member.param: The expected version of the stream.
member.returns: An optimistic concurrency control check that will only succeed if the stream has the specified version.

member.name: M:StreamsDB.Driver.ConcurrencyCheck.ExpectStreamLastMessage(StreamsDB.Driver.Message)
member.summary: Expect the stream to have the version that is equal to the position of the specified messaage.
member.remarks: It's important to understand that only the position will be verfied, not the actual value of the message nor it's ID or headers.
member.param: The message to use in the check.
member.returns: An optimistic concurrency control check that will only succeed if the stream version is equal to the position of the specified message.

member.name: T:StreamsDB.Driver.DB
member.summary: DB represents a database in StreamsDB.

member.name: M:StreamsDB.Driver.DB.AppendStream(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{StreamsDB.Driver.MessageInput})
member.summary: AppendStream appends the provides messages to the specified stream.
member.param: The stream to append to. If the stream does not exists, it will be created.
The messages to append.
member.returns: The position in the stream of the first message that has been written.

member.name: M:StreamsDB.Driver.DB.AppendStream(System.String,StreamsDB.Driver.MessageInput[])
member.summary: AppendStream appends the provides messages to the specified stream.
member.param: The stream to append to. If the stream does not exists, it will be created.
The messages to append.
member.returns: The position in the stream of the first message that has been written.

member.name: M:StreamsDB.Driver.DB.ReadLastMessageFromStream(System.String)
member.summary: ReadLastMessageFromStream returns the last message of a stream.
member.returns: A tuple containing the message and a boolean indication whether the message was found or not.

member.name: M:StreamsDB.Driver.DB.ReadMessageFromStream(System.String,System.Int64)
member.summary: ReadMessageFromStream returns the message from the stream at the specified position.
member.returns: A tuple containing the message and a boolean indication whether the message was found or not.

member.name: M:StreamsDB.Driver.DB.AppendStream(System.String,StreamsDB.Driver.ConcurrencyCheck,StreamsDB.Driver.MessageInput[])
member.summary: AppendStream appends the provides messages to the specified stream.
member.param: The stream to append to. If the stream does not exists, it will be created.
The optimistic concurrency check. See for different options.
The messages to append.
member.returns: The position in the stream of the first message that has been written.

member.name: M:StreamsDB.Driver.DB.AppendStream(System.String,StreamsDB.Driver.ConcurrencyCheck,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{StreamsDB.Driver.MessageInput})
member.summary: AppendStream appends the provides messages to the specified stream.
member.param: The stream to append to. If the stream does not exists, it will be created.
The optimistic concurrency check. See for different options.
The messages to append.
member.returns: The position in the stream of the first message that has been written.

member.name: M:StreamsDB.Driver.DB.SubscribeStream(System.String,System.Int64,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: SubscribeStream creates a stream subscription that allows you to read from a stream and receive future writes.
member.param: The stream to subscribe to.
The position to subscribe from.
The cancellation token to cancel the subscription.

member.name: M:StreamsDB.Driver.DB.ReadStreamForward(System.String,System.Int64,System.Int32)
member.summary: ReadStreamForward reads from a stream in the forward direction, in other words, reading from older to newer messages in a stream.
member.param: The stream to read from.
The position to read from.
The maximum number of messages to read.

member.name: M:StreamsDB.Driver.DB.ReadStreamBackward(System.String,System.Int64,System.Int32)
member.summary: ReadStreamBackward reads from a stream in the backward direction, in other words, reading from newer to older messages in the stream.
member.param: The stream to read from.
The position to read from.
The maximum number of messages to read.

member.name: T:StreamsDB.Driver.StreamsDBException
member.summary: Base exception for all well known StreamsDB exceptions.

member.name: T:StreamsDB.Driver.NotFoundException
member.summary: Some requested entity (e.g., database, user or stream) was not found.

member.name: T:StreamsDB.Driver.OperationAbortedException
member.summary: The operation was aborted, typically due to a concurrency issue such as a concurrency check failure.

member.name: T:StreamsDB.Driver.Message

member.summary: The value of this message in bytes.

member.summary: Gets or sets the header of the message.

member.name: P:StreamsDB.Driver.MessageInput.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the message.

member.name: P:StreamsDB.Driver.IStreamSlice.Reverse
